name: youtube.com - My Tweaks
description:
Just another youtube style.

* Removed:
- New Features from My Account page
- Voting ads in videos and categories
- Videos being watched right now
- Featured videos from Oprah
- Who is watching right now
- Also Watching Now
- Director videos
- Promoted videos
- Recent Ratings
* Resized featured videos on the main page.
* Resized pick of the day in Categories.
* Resized related videos.

10/10/07 - Updated some element IDs which got broken
10/25/07 - Removed recent user ratings 
11/05/07 - Removed featured videos 
04/18/08 - Removed sharing features
05/20/08 - Style re-written completely
06/21/08 - Updated for front page changes
07/03/08 - Moved all the css under youtube.com domain
11/20/08 - Got rid of the Chrome and Youtube Live banner
